content: madjin: Led a major documentation overhaul this week, merging two substantial PRs (#3951 and #3906) that collectively modified over 2,500 files with +100,998/-70,164 line changes, with 97% of changes focused on documentation. Created two issues (#3904 and #3936) related to documentation improvements and configuration features, both of which were subsequently closed. Maintained a consistent work pattern, being active on 5 out of 7 days with 29 commits across the week.
